content:
When researching the grind tactic, it is written that the main engines of the grind tactic are as follows:

  • Congruence closure

  • Constraint propagation

  • E-matching

  • Guided case analysis

  • Suite of satellite theory solvers

In this classification, where would the registration of theorems using the [grind intro] attribute fall?
It's used as a hint for E-matching.
Asei Inoue has marked this topic as resolved.
